document_data.name: Emerald Dolphin
document_data.mainbody: The '''Emerald Dolphin''' was a quality bar located in the city of [[Iljack]], [[Chondath]].
document_data.Services: Located near Iljack's Warehouse District, the Emerald Dolphin offered its guests quality and reasonably-priced drinks.
document_data.History: At some point before the {{YearlinkName|1370}}, [[Adamar Session]], [[Bard]] of [[Starmantle]], visited the Emerald Dolphin during his twelve-year adventuring trek across the Reach. The drinking establishment was praised in the bard's guide to the [[Vilhon Reach]].
